name: Transgression (Dabearmakesgames)
description:
A game I made for my University project. I improved it past this point previously but because of unity updates and not having Maya anymore. I can't fix the broken build. Here's a rough build of the game that I may one day go back to.

Its a game about controlling gravity on certain object and using this manipulation to solve various puzzles. Its only about 5 to 10 minutes in length and it ends a bit abruptly in this build.
